programme.title: Saved By The Barn
programme.desc: As Spring arrives in Michigan, the Barn Sanctuary prepares to open for all animals. Plus, Dan and Kelly come to the rescue of a lamb in desperate need of medical care.

programme.title: Meet The Penguins
programme.desc: A wild penguin receives treatment for a life-or-death wound, two home-pen inhabitants get into a nasty fight and one of the long-term residents celebrates a special occasion!

programme.title: Meet The Penguins
programme.desc: The odds are stacked against an undersized, abandoned chick. At almost four months Little Bluey weighs just over a kilo. The team do all they can - but will it be enough?

programme.title: Dodo Heroes
programme.desc: Donna Stepan runs Sleepy Burrow Wombat Sanctuary. When she takes in a new orphaned baby in critical condition, the next 24 hours become a fight for its life.

programme.title: Dogs: The Untold Story
programme.desc: Discover how dogs have evolved from wild predators to friendly pets. Plus, a look at parts of the world where dogs are spoiled as much as children.

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People
programme.desc: The Brown family of nine hatches a plan to deal with a lumber shortage, but then a sudden injury threatens to split the family apart.

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People
programme.desc: The Browns look to protect the newest family member from bears now seeking food on Chichagof Island. Matt races for his life as he tries returning home.

programme.title: How Do Animals Do That?
programme.desc: How do caterpillars transform into magnificent butterflies in their cocoon? Plus, why are cats tongues the way they are? Experts answer these questions and more!

programme.title: How Do Animals Do That?
programme.desc: Why are some cats cross-eyed? How do meerkats eat poisonous scorpions and how can hippos sleep whilst holding their breath? Experts answer these questions and more!

programme.title: Animal Cops Houston
programme.desc: Animal cruelty investigators join forces with Texas police officers in an attempt to smash one of the biggest dog fighting rings in US history.

programme.title: Animal Cops Houston
programme.desc: When investigators from the Houston SPCA respond to a call at a livery stable they find themselves in a life or death battle to save a severely neglected horse.

programme.title: Animal Cops Houston
programme.desc: When a dog is found with a tumour hanging from his neck, investigators battle to save him. In court, they have to win custody of the dog so he can receive treatment.

programme.title: Life at Vet University
programme.desc: School is in full swing and in just a few months the students will be doctors. Adding to the stress they must first pass their final rotations.

programme.title: Little Giants
programme.desc: The team searches the Nevada desert for the camel spider. This eight-legged terror has two pairs of jaws and is the fastest arachnid on the planet.

programme.title: Little Giants
programme.desc: The team scours a dangerous Thai rainforest to track down the stunningly coloured tokay gecko. Its gravity-defying adhesive abilities defy logic - and gravity.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: When Dr. Jeff examines a beloved Weimaraner who has stopped eating, he makes a surprising discovery; Dr. Baier investigates the cause of a pet rabbits mysterious fur loss; a servicewoman asks Dr. Jeff for help with her Pit Bulls injured leg.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: Dr. Jeff helps a dog with a serious illness. Mel and her daughter rescue a baby squirrel, while Dr. Jeff and Dr. Petra team up to save a beloved cat hit by a car.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Terri returns to her hometown in Oregon to help Brady, a cougar in need of a health check. At the zoo, Bindi bathes an echidna with bad skin allergies.

programme.title: Crikey! Its the Irwins
programme.desc: Terri helps prepare the zoos new baby rhino for a life-saving vaccine. Robert is on a rescue mission to save two black swans in bad shape.

programme.title: The Aquarium
programme.desc: Two African penguins, Freya and Neo, welcome a young chick, but then health problems arise. Staff work to train a trio of harbor seals to ride the elevator, with the only hiccup being a nervous seal named Floyd.

programme.title: Pit Bulls And Parolees
programme.desc: The rescue team begin Operation Rhino, hoping to place a long-term shelter resident in a fantastic home. Plus, two dogs need rescuing in the French Quarter.

programme.title: My Cat From Hell
programme.desc: Dorothy and Traviss cat vomits out of anger, and attacks them. They are afraid their son will be her next victim. Jackson will need all his experience to deal with this feline.

programme.title: Insane Pools: Off the Deep End
programme.desc: On his first collaboration with a local design team, Lucas creates a tropical oasis. It features an island, a huge grotto rock and a Tiki-themed cabana!

programme.title: Insane Pools: Off the Deep End
programme.desc: Lucas remodels an unusable pool for a famous golfing family. He creates an ocean-themed pool with fire features, an infinity edge and his first water couch!

programme.title: Extinct Or Alive
programme.desc: Forrest tracks clues and eyewitness accounts that suggest the Formosan Clouded Leopard, which was declared extinct only recently, could still be alive.

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: World famous DJ Steve Aoki wants to get Tanked! But this job will be way harder than pressing play, Steve wants a custom, 3-headed dragon on the verge of escape inside his tank! The guys have to make sure this job is as outrageous as the DJ himself!

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: Actress, activist, and entrepreneur Alyssa Milano tasks Wayde and Brett with making a tank for her family - an elegant aquarium with a built-in wine rack.

programme.title: Tanked
programme.desc: Famous filmmaker, Kevin Smith, needs a new home for his two turtles and one tortoise. Can Brett and Wayde build a tank to house both species?

programme.title: Alaska: Surviving the Last Frontier
programme.desc: Four groups of ordinary people are dropped into the remote wilderness of Alaska by bush pilot and survival expert Paul Claus. As each group struggles to find their new home in the wild they must overcome bears, glaciers and their fears.

programme.title: Animal ER
programme.desc: Owners Lisa and Callu are worried about Merlin, a Great Dane who goes over on his front toes when he walks. Neurologist Annette Wessman suspects a problem in his spine or skull.

programme.title: Saved By The Barn
programme.desc: A cow called Buttercup comes to the barn, but the team is concerned about her feisty behaviour. And, Ginger the lamb battles a life-threatening infection.

programme.title: Gamechangers: Inventing The World
programme.desc: Two technology entrepreneurs harness the power of solar energy to solve two different problems: water contamination in Ghana and jungle preservation in South America.

programme.title: Dodo Heroes
programme.desc: Theresa and Tony "Scruff" Matthews turned their retirement home in Australia into a kangaroo rescue and are releasing three back into the wild.

programme.title: Bad Dog
programme.desc: Features a cat that has too much catnip and knocks over the Christmas tree, a dog that ends up inside a toaster oven and a pet skunk that always gets her way.

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People
programme.desc: As the Wolfpack race to build a new "Boomtown" inspired basecamp, an unexpected tragedy strikes, and the family must grieve one of its own.

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People
programme.desc: The Browns face wild weather as they bring a haul to Port Alexander. The Integrity starts to show its age and the Browns get stranded in the middle of the water.

programme.title: Fish Or Die
programme.desc: Four friends set out on a gruelling jungle expedition to investigate rumours of Golden Dorado following migrating baitfish up an uncharted Bolivian river.

programme.title: Everest: Beyond the Limit
programme.desc: Experience one of the most dangerous expeditions on Earth as we chronicle the journey of a group of everyday people and their attempt to conquer the worlds highest mountain.

programme.title: Everest: Beyond the Limit
programme.desc: Brice sets the team a strict time limit as they make their first ascent to camp. Meanwhile, Betsy has one last climb to prove herself or face not taking part in the challenge.

programme.title: Dogs: The Untold Story
programme.desc: Discover how dogs have evolved from wild predators to friendly pets. Plus, a look at parts of the world where dogs are spoiled as much as children.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: Dr. Jeff treats a skittish Savannah cat with an unusual condition. And, the team races to save a stray dog as it runs toward the freeway.

programme.title: Saba And The Rhinos Secret
programme.desc: Adventurous wildlife expert Saba Douglas-Hamilton goes on an extraordinary journey to reveal the true personality and secret life of the rhino.

programme.title: Animal Cops Houston
programme.desc: When a dog is found hanging by her neck in a yard the SPCA tries to save her. And investigators rush to reunite some pups with their mother before its too late.

programme.title: Animal Cops Philadelphia
programme.desc: After a midnight call out the crew are shocked to find a grim menagerie of hundreds of birds, roosters and dogs. Have they been bred for fighting?

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: Marty embarks on an ambitious, off-grid hydropower system following a storm. Matt creates a meat smoker, but a surprise accident leads to a construction site injury.

programme.title: Fish Or Die
programme.desc: Four friends set out on a gruelling jungle expedition to investigate rumours of Golden Dorado following migrating baitfish up an uncharted Bolivian river.

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Wildlife agents are called out to rescue a black bear that has been hit by a car. Meanwhile, investigators confront the owner of an illegal pig slaughter operation.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: A dog with a shattered leg and seven bad-tempered chickens arrive at the clinic. And the team unites when a tiny kitten is found unconscious at a construction site.

programme.title: My Cat From Hell
programme.desc: Behaviourist Jackson Galaxy returns to help beleaguered owners tame their boisterous felines. He meets skydiver Jacques, who owns two ferocious Savannah cats, and Bijan and Heather, who are being driven apart by the territorial Wolfie.

programme.title: Dogs: The Untold Story
programme.desc: Discover how dogs have evolved from wild predators to friendly pets. Plus, a look at parts of the world where dogs are spoiled as much as children.

programme.title: Dr. Jeff: Rocky Mountain Vet
programme.desc: Dr. Jeff treats a skittish Savannah cat with an unusual condition. And, the team races to save a stray dog as it runs toward the freeway.

programme.title: Pandamonium
programme.desc: Follow giant panda Mao Maos pregnancy through to her dramatic breech birth as her keepers at the Wolong Conservation and Research Centre try to resuscitate her newborn cub.

programme.title: In Search Of Monsters
programme.desc: Experts discuss theories related to the worlds most famous cryptid, Bigfoot. Recently uncovered evidence unveils a creature far fiercer than previously believed.

programme.title: Alaskan Bush People
programme.desc: The Browns face impossible odds as they seek the final pieces for their off the grid dream. Noah misses his girl, while Bam has a surprise announcement.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: Marty embarks on an ambitious, off-grid hydropower system following a storm. Matt creates a meat smoker, but a surprise accident leads to a construction site injury.

programme.title: Animal Cops Miami
programme.desc: Wildlife agents are called out to rescue a black bear that has been hit by a car. Meanwhile, investigators confront the owner of an illegal pig slaughter operation.

programme.title: Dodo Heroes
programme.desc: Donna Stepan runs Sleepy Burrow Wombat Sanctuary. When she takes in a new orphaned baby in critical condition, the next 24 hours become a fight for its life.

programme.title: Jeremy Wades Dark Waters
programme.desc: The Lake Garda Monster has been described as a huge, humped bear -- half snake, half dinosaur. Jeremy travels to northern Italy to investigate, and discovers that these picturesque waters could be hiding several enormous beasts.

programme.title: Jeremy Wades Dark Waters
programme.desc: Jeremy Wade travels to Alaska to investigate the disappearance of the king salmon. His search will take him through grizzly bear territory, remote native communities and the Pacific Ocean as he follows a trail of evidence.

programme.title: Animal Cops Houston
programme.desc: When a dog is found hanging by her neck in a yard the SPCA tries to save her. And investigators rush to reunite some pups with their mother before its too late.

programme.title: Animal Cops Philadelphia
programme.desc: After a midnight call out the crew are shocked to find a grim menagerie of hundreds of birds, roosters and dogs. Have they been bred for fighting?

programme.title: In Search Of Monsters
programme.desc: Experts discuss theories related to the worlds most famous cryptid, Bigfoot. Recently uncovered evidence unveils a creature far fiercer than previously believed.

programme.title: Court-circuit
programme.desc: Trois courts metrages qui racontent des histoires de filiations : "Sauver les meubles" de Faustine Crespy, "The Pool or Death of a Goldfish" de Daria Kopiec et "Supersilly" de Veronica Martiradonna - Short Cuts : "Sully" de Clint Eastwood revu en une minute animee par Lorca Alonso.

programme.title: Le chaos quelle a laisse
programme.desc: Anna sent sa vie lui echapper : elle passe ses journees à soccuper de son père, alcoolique et autodestructeur, incapable de subvenir à ses besoins... Nikos Kolioukos orchestre un intense pas de deux entre père et fille, recompense en 2024 au Festival de Cannes.

programme.title: 42 - La reponse à presque tout
programme.desc: L’hibernation humaine : un fantasme aussi vieux que la science-fiction. Certains scientifiques pensent pourtant que nous sommes dotes de dispositions genetiques nous permettant d’hiberner. Un repos artificiel qui ferait economiser enormement de ressources et ouvrirait de nouvelles perspectives d’exploration spatiale. D’ailleurs, des chercheurs etudient dejà la faisabilite de ces technologies.

programme.title: "Le petit prince", naissance dune etoile
programme.desc: Compose d’archives et de formidables sequences d’animation, ce documentaire eclaire la genèse du chef-d’oeuvre d’Antoine de Saint-Exupery (1900-1944) en retraçant les quatre dernières annees de sa vie, marquees par la guerre et son exil aux États-Unis.

programme.title: Secrets sauvages du patrimoine
programme.desc: Sous le soleil de la garrigue, le Gardon serpente entre les roches, sculptant des gorges abruptes où la vie sadapte à ses crues soudaines aussi bien qu’aux implacables secheresses. Pour franchir cette rivière imprevisible, les Romains ont erige il y a deux mille ans un chef-dœuvre darchitecture : le pont du Gard. Plus haut aqueduc de lEmpire romain, il symbolise le genie antique.

programme.title: Les promesses de la terre
programme.desc: Territoires intermediaires entre plaines et montagnes, les plateaux forment de vastes etendues où l’elevage s’est impose comme l’une des principales activites. Mais, très exposes au vent et au soleil, ces grands espaces subissent aujourd’hui de plein fouet le derèglement climatique.

programme.title: 42 - La reponse à presque tout
programme.desc: Desormais, les antibiotiques peuvent etre inefficaces contre certaines bacteries. À force d’abus et de mauvaise observance des prescriptions, de nombreux germes deviennent en effet retifs aux traitements. Phenomène de plus en plus frequent, l’antibioresistance peut s’averer mortelle : on lui attribue ainsi près de 1,3 million de decès dans le monde. Les supermicrobes finiront-ils par avoir notre peau ?

programme.title: Dopamine, comment les applis piègent notre cerveau
programme.desc: Élaborees dans le plus grand secret par lindustrie de la tech, les applis grignotent de plus en plus notre temps. Les reseaux sociaux jouent avec notre cerveau et nous rendent veritablement "accros". Leur redoutable pouvoir repose sur une hormone, la dopamine. Comprendre le processus, c’est dejà apprendre à mieux le contrôler.

programme.title: Depression chez les hommes, un mal silencieux
programme.desc: À la rencontre de patients et de specialistes, cet etat des lieux sensible revèle combien il reste difficile pour une majorite dhommes souffrant de depression den reconnaître les symptômes.

programme.title: ARTE Junior, le mag
programme.desc: Il y a un un drame secouait la Serbie : le toit de la gare de Novi Sad seffondre - 16 personnes meurent. Depuis, des milliers de manifestants reclament une enquete et de nouvelles elections. Lune dentre eux cest Anja. Elle nous raconte son combat pour la democratie.

programme.title: 42 - La reponse à presque tout
programme.desc: Faire la fete, se desinhiber, noyer son chagrin... Toutes les occasions sont bonnes pour consommer de l’alcool. Mais la limite entre plaisir et dependance est tenue. Cet episode se penche sur le rôle socioculturel de la boisson, et sur son impact sanitaire. Pourquoi buvons-nous alors que nous en connaissons les risques ?

programme.title: 100 ans d’evolution de l’habitat
programme.desc: Il y a cent ans naissait l’architecture moderne, un nouveau modèle centre sur la lutte contre l’insalubrite et l’exiguïte de l’habitat. Dans cet episode : les architectes allemands du Neues Bauen des annees 1920 developpent des logements lumineux et abordables pour tous. Une pièce à vivre centrale, fonctionnelle et minimaliste fait son apparition : le sejour.

programme.title: Twist
programme.desc: La peur peut provoquer des vertiges, des sueurs froides ou des crises de panique. Mais que faire si elle s’invite au quotidien ? Dans "Twist", des artistes evoquent leurs strategies face à l’angoisse. Mieux comprendre les mecanismes de la peur permet-il de l’apprivoiser ?

programme.title: Inde, la fete des couleurs
programme.desc: En Inde, les veuves sont rejetees, stigmatisees et doivent porter le blanc, couleur de la mort. À Vrindavan cependant, elles trouvent refuge dans des foyers qui leur sont reserves et peuvent ainsi pour la première fois celebrer Holi, la fete des couleurs.

programme.title: Cuisines des terroirs
programme.desc: Dans les montagnes du sud de l’Albanie, Dhurata et son mari Sofo ont change de vie : avec 320 chèvres, vaches et volailles, un cheval, un mulet et un grand potager, la famille produit desormais presque tout ce dont elle a besoin. Dhurata confectionne elle-meme chaque pot de "turshis" – des legumes marines dans la saumure, l’huile ou le vinaigre pour assurer leur conservation.

programme.title: Hantes !
programme.desc: Au coeur des Carpates, en Transylvanie, se dresse le château de Bran, la demeure imaginaire du plus celèbre des vampires : le comte Dracula. Un voyage au cœur des croyances roumaines qui revient sur la legende sanguinaire inventee par Bram Stoker à la fin du XIXe siècle.

programme.title: Freddie Mercury, The Great Pretender
programme.desc: À base darchives et de temoignages rares, un portrait passionnant de Freddie Mercury (1946-1991), le legendaire leader de Queen, enigmatique icône musicale aux multiples facettes.

programme.title: Quand lhistoire fait dates
programme.desc: Le 24 septembre 1877, l’armee imperiale japonaise bat les derniers samouraïs qui s’etaient revoltes contre la modernisation à marche forcee souhaitee par l’empereur Meiji. La representation de la bataille et de ses protagonistes est souvent reduite à une opposition entre un Japon archaïque et une modernite occidentale. C’est pourtant une tout autre histoire qu’il nous faut raconter.

programme.title: La rose et la flèche
programme.desc: Robin des Bois et Marianne se retrouvent après vingt ans... En 1976, Richard Lester signe ce film d’aventure romantique avec Sean Connery et Audrey Hepburn, alors absente des ecrans depuis une decennie. Quand brillent les derniers feux de l’amour...

programme.title: Au coeur dune foret magique
programme.desc: Tisse de sublimes images capturees au fil des saisons, ce documentaire plonge au coeur du massif de Borzsony, sanctuaire de biodiversite situe dans le nord de la Hongrie.

programme.title: 42e Festival mondial du cirque de demain
programme.desc: Un rendez-vous annuel survolte avec les prodigieux talents circassiens du futur - et notamment la compagnie française La Tangente du bras tendu, le Malaisien Hng Thean Leong et la troupe ethiopienne Kolfe.

programme.title: Delacroix, un air de liberte
programme.desc: En 1830, Eugène Delacroix livre sa vision de la revolution de Juillet, à laquelle il a assiste, dans "La Liberte guidant le peuple". Suivant les etapes de sa restauration au Louvre, le realisateur Martin Fraudreau plonge dans cette page dhistoire et retrace le destin d’une toile devenue icône universelle.

programme.title: Les chemins de Bach
programme.desc: En quatre concerts donnes dans quatre lieux historiques rares, Raphaël Pichon et l’ensemble Pygmalion retracent les etapes de la biographie de Jean-Sebastien Bach en Thuringe. Un voyage musical riche et intimiste.

programme.title: Karambolage
programme.desc: Gros plan sur le Pumpernickel, un pain noir allemand très special ; sur la sonorite dun pet français versus un pet allemand ; et sur l’histoire de la langue d’Oc.

programme.title: ARTE Journal
programme.desc: Chaque jour à 19h45, la redaction franco-allemande dARTE Journal propose une approche europeenne et culturelle de lactualite. Un regard original sur le monde.

programme.title: Dans lombre dHitchcock
programme.desc: DAlfred Hitchcock, le grand public ne connaît que le geant du cinema, le maître du suspense. Mais derrière la celèbre silhouette, il y avait aussi Alma Reville Hitchcock. Cest à laune de cette relation fusionnelle mais aussi des stars et collaboratrices que ce film revisite et eclaire la legende.

programme.title: Witness
programme.desc: À la mort de son mari, Rachel et son fils Samuel, membres de la communaute amish, decident de prendre quelques jours de repos à Baltimore. À la gare de Philadelphie, le petit Samuel est le seul temoin du meurtre dun agent secret de la division des narcotiques. John Book Book, linspecteur en charge de lenquete, va rapidement decouvrir que ses superieurs sont impliques.

programme.title: Harvey Keitel, à lombre des tenèbres
programme.desc: Sa carrière, qu’en jeune fou il a d’abord sabotee, s’est bonifiee avec les annees. Un portrait savoureux de l’acteur et producteur Harvey Keitel, qui a tourne neuf films avec son ami Martin Scorsese.

programme.title: Iveta Apkalna, une organiste au firmament
programme.desc: Elle est lune des organistes les plus douees de sa generation. Un portrait sensible dIveta Apkalna, musicienne lettone passionnee qui fait resonner son instrument dans le monde entier.

programme.title: Concert dorgue dIveta Apkalna - Cathedrale de Riga
programme.desc: À loccasion du 140e anniversaire de lorgue de la cathedrale de Riga, l’organiste lettone Iveta Apkalna et le Choeur de Lettonie proposent un concert qui mele oeuvres classiques (Jean-Sebastien Bach, Franz Liszt) et contemporaines (Sven-David Sandstrom), revelant ainsi toute la richesse sonore de cet instrument exceptionnel.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Elmore residents are going missing and the cause of these disappearances may be closer to home than Gumball and Darwin think. A breaking news report tells the Wattersons that their neighbour is among the several mysterious disappearances happening across Elmore. Their search for clues leads them to find a strange egg which they soon discover belongs to their own Evil Turtle. The family realise that it’s their responsibility to track down their pet before she and her brood do more damage to the town.

programme.title: The Amazing World of Gumball
programme.desc: Gumball and Darwin discover Tobias is doing way better than them in an online game called Galatrek. Tobias admits he earns good points doing chores for his parents, which he then exchanges for dollars to buy cool stuff for Galatrek. If Gumball and Darwin do Tobias chores they can earn his good points and use them for Galatrek. Gumball and Darwin think they’ve hit the jackpot. But these good points may not be quite as good as Tobias claims.

programme.title: The Heroic Quest of the Valiant Prince Ivandoe

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Skinny brings home the wrong laundry bag. Not a disaster, as it happens, since this particular laundry bag contains uncanny super-suits that grant mighty powers. The Docs get heat vision, amazing telekinesis rays, magnetic boots, you name it. All perfect for the person who dreams of… doing the household chores. With great power comes great boringness, apparently. After a satisfying day of getting the house spick n’ span, the penny finally drops for the Super-docs: they realise they have a far higher calling. Is it fighting evil and helping the underdog? Nope, it’s chasing Lamput, same as usual. Meanwhile, however, two actual superheroes really want their suits back. Turns out these heroes are quite into helping the underdog. Which is good news for Lamput, and very, very bad news for the Docs.

programme.title: Lamput

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Pregnant Doc: During a chase, Specs accidentally swallows Lamput. The Docs plan to bring Lamput back to the lab! While Specs gets used to being a mother-to-be, Skinny tries to get the two of them out of the hospital and back to the lab. Will Lamput stay in Spec’s tummy this whole time?Reverse: In a new attempt to catch Lamput, The Docs invent a remote that reverses anything back in time. programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The orange blob is down at the Museum, nerding out about ancient Egypt, when the Docs show up and ruin Lamput’s day. Darn science geeks. No respect for culture. A superior knowledge of history keeps Lamput one step ahead of the blue boffins - how many times can two chemists get kicked out of the same Museum? The Docs sneak back into the exhibition disguised as mummies. They learn the hard way that a disguise can be TOO good; they get locked into a glass box overnight. Lucky break, though; this is the night when a renowned jewel thief tries to steal the museum’s precious treasures. Lamput and the Docs get tangled up in the heist. The rest is history.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput spends the day at the beach, and, in a pair of swimming trunks, cuts a fine figure indeed. That is to say; a small, round and blobby figure. It only takes one snide comment from a fellow beach-goer to bring Lamputs body issues to the surface. When youre a shape changer, though, theres no need for exercise; before long Lamput is strutting along as an orange amalgam of all the best-looking sunbakers. On the up side, its a handy disguise when the Docs come a-hunting. On the down side? Well, its kind of tiring pretending to be someone youre not. Lamput learns an important lesson from a nearby blobby little girl. Be yourself, and if anyones got a problem with that, they can go find their own patch of sand.

Grizzy is determined to eliminate the parasites, down to the very last one. The problem is his little roommates have no desire whatsoever to be treated...

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Another heat wave: even the riverbed is dried up. One very thirsty Grizzy discovers that the Lemmings have used the last remaining bottles of water to fill their inflatable pool. He has no intention of letting the Lemmings swim in what might very well be his last chance to quench his thirst.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have caught a little spider. Her sticky threads are perfect for bungee jumping. Grizzy, who has no intention of getting caught in the web, decides to crush the insect.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over chocolate-spread jar lids, which they use as chips to win goodies. But more importantly, theres s grand prize: a giant jar of Yummy.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has prepared himself a TV dinner to eat in front of his favorite series. But his moment of pleasure is abruptly interrupted by unexplained static. Grizzy rapidly discovers that the true "interference" is the Lemmings, who are using the TV antenna as a diving board for their water games.

programme.title: SuperThings: Rivals of Kaboom - Kazoom Power
programme.desc: The Kazoom Kids engage in an epic battle to take the Kazoom fragment, which ultimately activates the volcano.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: When the ghost of a small towns founder returns to scare off mayoral candidates, the gang decides to run Velma as mayor to bait the ghost. They quickly discover, however, that Velma lacks the skillset to make her a popular politician!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang travels to Britain in 1843-ish and runs into Scrooge who claims he was attacked by the ghost of his partner Jacob Marley and that three more ghosts are coming. The gang agrees to solve the mystery but Velma wonders if she has more potential than just solving mysteries.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: When Lamput masquerades as a swimming trophy at the local pool, Skinny finds himself in his red trunks, warming up for the big race. You’d be surprised at how fast a Doc can swim when there’s a Lamput up for grabs. Skinny discovers skills not even he was aware of. Shame the trophies keep switching places. No lap-time in the world can outsmart this little orange blob.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Everyone seems to be going on holiday apart from Mr Bean, so he decides to recreate one at home!

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is on his way to the seaside when the mini runs out of petrol.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Scrapper gives Bean fleas and Bean is forced to call in the pest control person. His flat will take 24 hours to fumigate.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When his car gives up the ghost and he is forced to sell it to the junkyard, Bean builds a hot-air balloon to get around town.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: As usual, Grizzy picks the door of the Rangers log cabin to come in and make himself comfortable, but this time its impossible to enter!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have got their hands on a pack of white beans which have very strange properties: when mixed with soda, anyone who eats them turns into a bouncing ball.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a blast with a bowling game they found in the Rangers storeroom. Grizzy hastens to destroy the pins to ensure his peace and quiet. But the Lemmings discover a remote-control device that can modify the balls weight. By setting it on maximum, the ball could knock over much more than pins: furniture, a bear and even a log cabin!

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings inherit a crate that fell off a Canadian army convoy. Inside, a case emits a sort of laser beam that divides objects into multiple miniaturized versions of themselves.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Near the supermarket a machine hands out surprise eggs in exchange for a coin. Amongst the lots to be won, there is a super firework rocket the Lemmings dream of, and a piece of costume jewelry that Grizzy imagines himself giving to his lady-love.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy uses the rangers new gadget to become a smarter bear. But first, he wants to learn how to get rid of his obnoxious houseguests.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.desc: An old metal box found by chance in a recess of a cliff brings back childhood memories for Grizzy and the Lemmings.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Lamput faints of thirst on a desert highway, so already it’s not a great day for the little orange shape-shifter. Add to that the fact that Specs and Skinny just happen by in a lockup van, and things go south pretty promptly. Specs and Skinny learn a valuable lesson: maybe if you’re going to anger a morphing super-blob by throwing them in the back of a van and withholding precious water, you shouldn’t do it whilst driving by a 100 foot cliff drop down to the open ocean. Hopefully these Docs are better swimmers than your average academic.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Everyone is ecstatic when Bibi, Batgirl, and Robin capture Toyman and his Do-Over remote - except for Bibi, who failed to stick the landing on a big jump. Unwilling to accept her failure, Bibi uses Toymans Do-Over remote until she perfects her jump!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Bam is sent out to take on Prank, Redbird asks to join the fight, but Bam insists he hangs back - that Vans too dangerous!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After Jestah’s insults get the best of her, a short-tempered Bibi tries to not let the big-wheeled bullys words get to her so she can help Batgirl catch Harley.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Feeling neglected after being passed over on missions, Bam asks MOE to install experimental upgrades to curry Batmans favor. But, when Bams new powers are stronger than he can control, Batman – and the mission – are suddenly in danger!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney builders rush to build a soccer stadium in Mexico for their customer, Speedy Gonzalez.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Easter Bunny is sick, so she hires The Looney Builders to take over the festivities and ensure Looneyburg has a great Easter.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by Ma and Pa Bear to build a bedroom for their son, Junior, whose excitement causes setbacks.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: When The Looney Builders help Wile E. Coyote build a telescope to view the Looney Moon, Tweety must face his fear of the dark. / The Looney Builders are hired by Mayor Leghorn to build the venue for the Looney Games. They soon become overwhelmed by the job and must ask for help.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Peter, a pretentious cheapskate poodle, demands that Tom and Jerry help protect his precious sapphire egg on a train journey but wont pay their fare. The cat and mouse become stowaways and go to a lot of trouble to do their job, but the outcome is unexpected.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: As Jerry and Tuffy play marbles, Tom throws a soccer ball in their direction and upsets the game. This sparks a chase between Tom and Jerry, and Jerry takes cover in a room that looks like a giant chessboard. As more chess pieces show up, Tom and Jerry attempt their best to outplay them.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: After catching a crook, Tom and Jerry are framed, and the police chase them instead of the true criminal. Tom and Jerry must go on the lam as they try to avoid jail time.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Because of an injured foot, Rick stays home with Gingers mother, Rosemary, taking care of him. Rosemary brings her infamous fat-free-dairy-free whole wheat gravy, and she quickly puts Rick, Spike and Tom on nutritious diets. Antics and fights break out as Rick and the pets crave real food.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry take a case for Toodles cousin in Hawaii, hoping to sneak in some rest and relaxation, but its no vacation. The cousins missing pineapple plant is only the starting place of the investigation as Tom and Jerry track down the culprit in this tropical environment.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom is chasing the mice around the haunted house when midnight strikes, and he finds himself face-to-face with a green-faced beast whos just as surprised to encounter Tom. Its soon revealed to be Toodles, whos a good witch brewing magic beauty products. Although Tom is enchanted at first, things stop going smoothly when he helps with her potions.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Ella finds her Nannys old Hide and Peek device and hopes to beat Slippys record for Hide and Seek! Gem and I.Lo are playing too. Slippy decides to make things more interesting by siphoning fuel from the Hide and Peek.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: When Glitch’s compartment empties out and a huge amount of junk floats out, Ella suggests that Slippy get rid of it. They all head to Vesta. Slippy is enchanted by the amount of stuff on the planetoid. Madhu finds something that looks like a robot so the gang sets out to find the other pieces. They quickly put together an impressive robot they call Victor. Victor is designed to recycle and he happily does just that. But when Slippy brings him back to the Clubhouse, they soon realise Victor needs to be in his home.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Its Priyas birthday, so the gang is looking for something special as a gift for her. Ella suggests a birthday star, which is a star that is the same light years away as your age.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Ella stretches the truth a bit when she tells Angelie she can comet surf. She decides to try but finds its a lot harder than it looks. Slippy adds rockets to an asteroid so Ella can practice on that instead.

programme.title: Interstellar Ella
programme.desc: Slippy needs iron to fix his spaceracer. Ella tows him to a metal asteroid where Glitch is instructed to cut off a small piece. But when Ella distracts him, he accidentally cuts the asteroid into two large pieces! Ella feels responsible

programme.title: Toad And Friends
programme.desc: When Toad finds hes related to royalty, his airs and graces offend his friends.

programme.title: Toad And Friends
programme.desc: When a duckling imprints on Toad, he finds himself with an adoring fan. In trying to rehome the duckling on the river, Toad puts it in grave danger.

programme.title: Toad And Friends
programme.desc: Hedge finds herself torn in several directions as she tries to help out too many of her friends.

programme.title: Toad And Friends
programme.desc: Portly traps a butterfly in a jar in order to observe it, but when grounded himself, he realizes that no one likes confinement.

programme.title: Toad And Friends
programme.desc: Toad resolves to keep fit in order to win the racing challenge thrown down by the weasels.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean discovers being in hospital isnt always a bed of roses.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has to replace his landlady’s cat after an unfortunate ‘accident’.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean builds a supermarket super trolley.

programme.title: Mr Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean gets in a complete flap when he befriends a feathered theif.

programme.desc: Ella finds her Nannys old Hide and Peek device and hopes to beat Slippys record for Hide and Seek! Gem and I.Lo are playing too. Slippy decides to make things more interesting by siphoning fuel from the Hide and Peek.

programme.title: Biz Talk
programme.desc: A groundbreaking 30-minute interview show, giving an in-depth look into how top companies around the world conduct business and how policymakers view the fast-changing world economy. It presents 360 degree profiles of industry movers and shakers, tech mavericks and policymakers, and drills down on the stories behind their success, to give you clarity on what’s happening in every facet of business.

programme.title: The Agenda
programme.desc: A weekly talk-show looking beyond the headlines and “accepted wisdom” to find the real story. Hosted by award-winning journalist and presenter Stephen Cole, The Agenda quite simply sets The Agenda . You won’t find the same-old talking heads recycling platitudes; instead thought-provoking guests to debate and explore key issues of today’s world. Using virtual reality graphics to bring subjects to life, Stephen will navigate through subjects ranging from “Prove That Climate Change Exists” to “Who Will Win the Race to Space”. Opposing views will be given opportunity to flourish and develop into a meaningful conversation. The Agenda: No nonsense talk; Challenging perceptions.

programme.desc: The team uncovers shocking evidence of a web of underground tunnels connecting the homes of key players in Kevins theory, offering possible proof that members of the 4th Michigan Cavalry returned home with millions in Confederate gold.

programme.desc: Bob Baer and John Cencich investigate a secretive German community with reported Nazi ties. Inside the compound they find clues to a formation of a potential Fourth Reich.

programme.desc: The team uncovers shocking evidence of a web of underground tunnels connecting the homes of key players in Kevins theory, offering possible proof that members of the 4th Michigan Cavalry returned home with millions in Confederate gold.

programme.title: In Search Of Aliens
programme.desc: The mysterious Mediterranean island of Malta lies south of Sicily and is home to megalithic structures built by a mysterious prehistoric society. Who were the people that built these sophisticated structures?

programme.title: Hunting Hitler
programme.desc: Bob Baer and John Cencich investigate a secretive German community with reported Nazi ties. Inside the compound they find clues to a formation of a potential Fourth Reich.

programme.title: The Universe: Ancient Mysteries Solved
programme.desc: This episode examines almost 20 centuries of theories, including meteors, novae, supernovae and comets...but is the truth to be found in a combination of astronomy--and astrology?

programme.title: The Hunt For Baltic Gold
programme.desc: For thousands of years, amber has continued to be the object of desire for hunters roaming the stormy seaside. This series tells the story of the Polish people who live and breathe amber in their everyday lives.

programme.title: Lost Gold Of World War II
programme.desc: In the closing months of WWII, legend has it that the Japanese buried something of immense value deep in the Philippine jungle. A group of investigators and engineers are using the latest technology to search for the treasure and the truth.

programme.title: Ancient Top 10
programme.desc: Ancient Top 10 is a smart, fun countdown that details how ancient technology worked, how surprisingly advanced it was, and how it was kind of awesome!

programme.title: UFO Files
programme.desc: Investigate the facts and myths surrounding UFO sightings in every corner of the world. Examine evidence and eyewitness accounts and explore the mystery of what happened or what didnt happen.

programme.title: Missing In Alaska
programme.desc: ‘Missing in Alaska’ investigates the region of northwest Alaska, where over 20,000 people have vanished in an area locals call the Alaska Triangle. In all these cases, the bodies are rarely discovered. Who or whats behind these cases is unknown.

programme.title: Warriors
programme.desc: ‘Warriors’ delves deep into the warrior mindset: the rites of passage, the initiations and the rituals, which reveal what makes them rise above the rest of humankind to lead, to fight, and in some cases, to die.

programme.title: Food Tech
programme.desc: Bobby Bognar, a food industry veteran, travels the world deconstructing favourite meals. Along the way he reveals the hidden world behind every bite, sees first-hand how ingredients from around the globe come together to become the meals we love.

programme.title: Serial Killer Earth
programme.desc: With the aid of a team of experts and eyewitness testimony, ‘Serial Killer Earth’ delves deep into the destructive power of natural disasters, and in the process explains how they compare with natural disasters of the past.

programme.title: River Hunters

programme.title: MonsterQuest
programme.desc: Bigfoot, Loch Ness Monster, killer beasts on land and sea? Are these myths, legends, folklore or real monsters lurking in the world around us?

programme.title: The Universe
programme.desc: ‘The Universe’ examines how we know what we do about space; Mars, black holes and even if there is anywhere else out there that can sustain human life. This is the story of the scientists and explorers who dared to venture into uncharted territory.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: ‘Ancient Aliens’ examines 75 million years of the most credible alien evidence here on Earth, from the age of the dinosaurs to ancient Egypt to the skies over the western desert in present day USA.

programme.title: The Best of MonsterQuest
programme.desc: MonsterQuest explores strange and unknown creatures around the world that have allegedly been spotted by witnesses.

programme.title: Rome: Rise And Fall Of An Empire
programme.desc: 60BC. Over-powerful generals and money corrupt the Roman Republic. With Rome falling into and out of civil wars, Julius Caesar is to defy all rivals and laws to make himself dictator for life!

programme.title: Pirate Treasure Of The Knights Templar
programme.desc: Barry and Scott learn the meaning behind one of the symbols on the prized metal ingot they believe once belonged to Captain Kidd, leading them one step closer to a Templar-Pirate connection - and finding lost treasure.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner
programme.desc: During the Middle Ages, the Vikings were infamous for being a bloodthirsty band of seafaring warriors. Is it possible that they were not the savage brutes we think of today - but rather, a highly advanced civilisation?

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Corey finds out if the force is with him when a seller brings two Star Wars Lego minifigures. Can he "C" his way to a deal, or will he run into a brick wall? Rick tries not to pop with excitement when he checks out a Jeff Koons Balloon Dog statue.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: A set of replica Muppets has Chum green with envy; Will going gonzo over these furry friends land him the goods? When a pair of pants supposedly worn by Keith Richards rolls into the shop, Corey teaches Jake you cant always get what you want.

programme.title: Ancient Aliens: Origins
programme.desc: An argument for the Ancient Astronaut theory is the engineering evident in the construction of ancient megalithic sites worldwide; colossal stones, precise cuts, and fitted blocks at many of these sites hint at the prospect of advanced technology.

programme.title: The UnXplained With William Shatner
programme.desc: WWII was the deadliest, conflict in human history. During that time, a number of intriguing and persistent mysteries were born. Curious stories about everything remain unexplained. Can new information help us understand the strangest tales of WWII?

programme.title: Ancient Aliens
programme.desc: Did a biblical patriarch receive instructions from 200 angels high above the earth? Were the ancient Greeks taught how to work metal by a race of fish-people? And might Egypts most controversial pharoah have been an extraterrestrial being?

programme.title: Curse Of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: After the team conducts a simultaneous drone swarm experiment in order to stimulate phenomena on Skinwalker Ranch, they encounter more than what they bargained for.

programme.desc: A dog with the ability to detect cancer. A horse that can read minds. Birds that sense future disasters. What gives animals these extraordinary powers?

programme.desc: Is there something more to the act of escape? Do people unlock powers and abilities when confined that they dont normally otherwise have, and could that be what fascinates us about daring escapes?

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: Things get scary when a seller comes in with a letter from Stephen King. Will all work and no play make Corey a dull boy? Corey pays lip service to a Harrison family tradition when a James Bond poster comes in. Does he spy a deal?

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: When a customer walks into the shop with a signature worthy of presidential praise, can Corey make a new deal? A magician has an enchanting car once owned by Siegfried and Roy. Will Rick and Corey conjure up the right price before it disappears?

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: When a friend swings by to show Rick and Chum a star-studded collection of photos, will the duo expose the right price, or get shot down? A vintage LP of the single “We Are the World" spins into the shop. Will this deal make a brighter day for Corey?

programme.title: Historys Greatest Mysteries
programme.desc: An Aztec kings glittering treasure vanishes into thin air, inspiring a 500-year search that spans continents. One of the greatest warriors of all-time amassed a vast horde believed to be worth more than $3 billion today.

programme.title: Life After People
programme.desc: In a world without humans, the deserts we once tamed rise to reclaim our greatest triumphs—from the lights of Las Vegas to the heights of Dubai’s Burj Khalifa. As sand and sun dismantle our cities, the wastelands quietly take back the ground.

programme.title: Curse Of Skinwalker Ranch
programme.desc: As the team launches high-powered rockets into the sky on Skinwalker Ranch, they are frozen in shock by what they encounter.

programme.title: Pawn Stars
programme.desc: When a seller whips into the shop with an "Energy Dome" hat made for the band DEVO, will Ricks offer top the charts? And later, Ricks intrigued by a signed George Washington letter. But will the asking price cause him to start a rebellion?

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: After Big Nutbrown Hare shows Little Nutbrown Hare a special place where his voice echoes, he and Little Field Mouse play a game of Try to find me with Little Redwood Fox and Little Grey Squirrel. They hide in the ravine and as their voices bounce off the rocky walls, their friends have a very tricky time trying to find them.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: When Little Nutbrown Hare, Little Field Mouse and Big Nutbrown Hare go up to high meadow with Big Nutbrown Hare they get caught in the mist. It’s a little scary so they hold hands and pass the time by playing guessing games. As the mist starts to lift, they see a beautiful circle rainbow around the sun.

programme.title: Learning Time With Timmy
programme.desc: The class are learning about music. Can you guess what instruments they are playing?

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: Huckle, Lowly and Sally set out to prove to Pig Will and Pig Won’t that the figure they saw wearing a strange yellow suit and helmet is not a spaceman from another planet. The clues finally lead them to the realization that it was really Granny Goodpig wearing her yellow suit to protect her while she collected honey from her beehives./ Someone took all the red roses from Granny Goats garden leaving Huckle and gang puzzled.

programme.title: Messy Goes To Okido
programme.desc: In the real world, it’s Christmas Eve and Messy is just too excited. He can’t wait for Christmas day and wants to stay awake all night. He wonders why he has to go to sleep at all, so he goes to Okido to find out. When he lands in Okido he finds Zoe and Felix can’t sleep either, they’re just too excited for Mother Christmas to arrive. But wait “Mother Christmas… what kind of Christmas is this?” asks Messy. Zoe and Felix pull out their Okido Christmas story book and show Messy what happens at Christmas in Okido.

programme.title: Messy Goes To Okido
programme.desc: In the real world, Messy is having fun playing with his remote controlled truck. “Watch out for that sandwich… mind those socks!” he shouts as he steers the truck around his messy, make-shift obstacle course of toy bits and pieces. “He’s amazing, he’s going to win, he’s, he’s, he’s… stopped?” Messy hops down off the sofa to check what’s wrong with his motionless truck. When you need to know go to Okido! Messy lands with a skip and a bounce at Zoe and Felix’s house. Zoe and Felix open the door to let Messy inside.

programme.title: Strawberry Shortcakes Berry Bitty Adventures
programme.desc: When a simple tune Cherry composes goes viral on the Berryweb, Cherry quickly gets fed up with everyone listening to this song, everywhere, all the time. She goes to comic lengths to get some peace so she can compose the song shes suppose to write for the Queen of Berryvania.

programme.title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Harry receives a box of magic tricks for Christmas but is unable to create any magic.

programme.title: Harry And His Bucket Full Of Dinosaurs
programme.desc: Harry is scared of going to the dentist, but when Trike complains that his horn is sore Harry insists that Trike goes to the Horntist in Dino World.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: As Farah is drawing poop on her handbook in the national park, she hears a loud growl nearby and leaps onto her dirtbike to seek the source. She sees a lioness and her cub stuck inside a man-made well, clumsily failing to get out. She immediately calls the Rangers for help. Back in the garden, Leo And Katie were playing frisbee. Katie tries to do throw it just like Leo does it but she fails, upsetting her. As Leo instructs Katie on how to do it, he receives the call from Farah. Farah tells them about the trapped animals, causing the duo to learn more about the lion back in the treehouse. Farah then informs them of more lions coming over, where Leo tells her to get to safety first. As the Rangers arrive and land PlatypusOne from afar, Leo uses his binoculars and sees the 2 female lions still roaming around the well. They see Farah hides on top of a nearby hill and meet her there. As they were discussing on how to help the lioness, Katie points out a fallen log nearby that can be used. Farah misunderstood and rush onto her bike to cause a distraction for the 2 lioness around the well, but Ranger Rocky appears and stops her. Ranger Rocky then ask more information on the Asiatic Lion from Ranger Joey. Ranger Joey advices them about the Asiatic Lions hunting behavior, giving the group an idea to pretend as a Sambar Deer to distract the animal there.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: When Rebecca tells James he could be a comic-book super-engine, he takes her seriously, and Rail Rocket is born.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: When Thomas has a run of bad luck, he tries everything to get back on track... even if it means following Lorenzos strange, superstitious advice!

programme.title: Grisu
programme.desc: Professor Smeraldo, in the middle of a pyramid exploration, calls Fume to have some information about Thudnose, a pharaoh who was nicknamed ""The Dragon Pharaoh"". Unfornutately, the video communication is not good and is quickly cut off. Grisù and Fume go to Egypt to give Smeraldo a hand. Unfortunately, they dont know how to get into the pyramid to meet him, so they have no other choice than find their way all by themselves, like Egyptologist. Grisu manages to use and decrypt the pharaohs secret motto. They finally find Smeraldo. Grisu helps him to overcome the final obstacle to eventually discover the marvelous sarcophagus of Thudnose!

programme.title: Grisu
programme.desc: Grisu and Stella are wandering in the harbour eating an ice-cream. David arrives by car, he comes to see his friend Olivier, a sailor whose expedition has just fallen through. Olivier was supposed to go sailing and clear up the mystery of the “Mermaid pass” but his teammates have withdrawn at the last minute. Fortunately, Grisu can replace them.And here are Olivier and Grisu leaving on the planned expedition. But they didnt notice that Stella is also on board, locked in a closet in spite of herself.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: On Summer’s hottest night Little Nutbrown Hare finds it hard to sleep. When a swim in the river isn’t enough to cool him down, Little Nutbrown Hare and his friends ask Little White Owl to tell them a really cold and sleepy bedtime story. Will she come up with a story that can make them feel cool and finally get Little Nutbrown Hare off to sleep?

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare is impressed by Blue Bird’s description of a flowery field that looks just like a sea of colour from her bird’s eye view. He visits the field with Big Nutbrown Hare and Little Field Mouse, and they discover that everyone has their own unique view of the field, and each one is special in its own way.

programme.title: Chuggington Badge Quest
programme.desc: To earn their Town Crier badges, Wilson and Brewster each have to make an announcement, speaking loudly, clearly and with style. Brewster is too quiet and nobody listens to him. Wilson is loud and clear, but he exaggerates! Having failed their first badge attempt, Wilson and Brewster decide to help each other. Brewster teaches Wilson how to stick to the facts and Wilson gives Brewster pointers on announcing with pizzazz. They both earn their badges on the second try!

programme.title: The Fox-Badger Family
programme.desc: As the Foxes leave to celebrate the summer solstice holiday at the Fox grandparents, Edmund sets about making a gift for Margaret. Indeed, this traditional holiday is all about giving gifts to those you love. The Twins are keen to make a present for Rosie. Thats great, but what should they do? Scoutbadger isthinking of something useful, while Woodsy leans towards something beautiful.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Science and engineering hot shot Mei Moon has designed and built a rocket, named Stella. If successful Stella will become the smallest rocket ever to reach space. The Spring City Rockets have gathered and made a banner to celebrate and Bobs job is to finish building Stellas launch pad near the Observatory. Lofty is given the important task of lifting Stella onto the launch pad. Mei reminds him he has to be very careful, but he becomes flustered and tries to place the rocket before the launch pad is finished. Stella falls off and flops into wet concrete, ejecting her landing parachute, which Lofty accidentally runs over and rips. Now the launch is ruined. The team clean the concrete splattered rocket by using the machine wash back at the yard, but they still have the problem of the ripped parachute.

programme.title: Bob the Builder
programme.desc: Bob and the team have been busy building a new water park, “Spring City Splash” that includes a wave pool and splash zone. Now there is only one thing left to build... the double dragon water slide. Scoop loves dragons and cannot wait to help build the slides, but when he is asked to help build the support beams instead, he is less than impressed with his job. As Bob attaches the new water park entrance sign, Scoop digs foundations for the support beams. Suddenly Scoop becomes distracted with the arrival of the dragon slides and doesn’t finish the foundations. He attempts to see the dragon slides only to be sent back to finish his job. Now totally eager to get to the slides, Scoop rushes to complete his job and doesn’t realise that the support beams are not set and are beginning to lean.

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: The kids awesome sandcastle gets trampled overnight. A lone set of footprints along the beach leads to a prime suspect who claims not to have seen their sandcastle, yet hes carrying a big shell that once adorned it. As it turns out, no one touched their castle. The culprit was the rising waters of high tide. / /Huckle, Sally and Lowly discover the impossible – a set of ski tracks that run on either side of a tall tree.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Zari was talking to her mom on her phone as she walks down a lonely street lined with a lampposts. As she stops under a lamppost and the light begins to flicker, she slowly looks upwards to see a monster hanging from a lamppost. She skates away in fear, and remember her phone was there. She returns to the area and notice the so-called monster looks like a bat. Back in the garden, Leo is practicing with his jetpack maneuvering skill by performing spiral pattern and zig zag. He talks to Katie who is by her computer. After almost crashing into Hero the dog, Leo crash lands on the ground. Katie jokes on his skill before Leo receives a call from Zari. Zari informs them of the monster she met, which they later to learn it is a Greater Flying Fox. After agreeing to help Zari out, the Junior Rangers travels to her location. They meet up with Zari under the lamppost, where she show them of the animal. Hero tries barking at the animal but it ignores him. Katie has an idea and pulled her tablet to guide the flying fox away. Leo takes Katies tablet and fly with his jetpack to guide the Flying fox. As they were travelling, Katie notices Leos Jetpack is malfunctioning, causing Leo to have issues with flying and he crash land uncontrollably into a bush. They check up on him and Leo is okay.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: Farah was driving her dirt bike but she stops as she hears a loud cries, grabbing her attention. She investigate and finds a baby moon bear crying for help. Back in the garden, Katie and Leo are playing tag. Leo blocks Katies path to touch Hero but Katie manages to tricks him. But Hero manages to escape as he was distracted by a butterfly. Suddenly, Farah calls for help through Leos watch, informing them of the poor animal cub with her. After the Junior Rangers learn that its a Moon Bear cub and wanting to help, they travel to meet up with Farah by riding PlatypusOne. Once theyre there, Farah tells them she has name the cub Cubby. Katie then reads her tablet and says that moon bear need to learn how to climb trees, swim, mark territories and communicate with other bears to survive, hence a montage happens of the Junior Rangers. Then they try teaching Cubby how to growl like a bear so they all imitate bear growling. Cubby gives it a try but struggle to do it. Ranger Rocky randomly appears and the Junior Rangers tells him of their situation. Ranger Rocky decides to call out his dear friend Ranger Joey and asks for help.

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: Simon is playing hide and seek in the yard with his friend Lou and his little brother Gaspard. Lou can’t find Simon. It seems that Simon has some very particular rules though, ones that only he knows! Lou figures this out when it’s Gaspard’s turn to count and look for them and Simon drags Lou off to hide with him: he changes hiding places every few seconds! Well, since that’s how it’s going to be, Lou is going to play by Simon’s rules and sure enough, Simon gets tricked! Lou quickly realizes that with these strange new rules, hide and seek is even more fun than usual!.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: The Moonbug cant walk. The centipede always helps him to get him to where he wants to go. But one day the centipede has to go on a long journey, so the Moonbug is left to go alone to Alfonsos concert. But Eddy, the potatobeetle builds a special chair with wheels for Moonbug. The Moonbug can finally go alone to Alfonsos concert, and anywhere he wants to.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: A great storm tears down the fireflies house. The whole house breaks into peaces and all the lanterns with it. So the small firefiles go on a journey to find the wise old Shining Bug, and ask him to give them new lanterns. When the fireflies return home they are surprised by their new home, the forest friends have built them.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: On a spring day, Flutter meets a group of unknown butterfly girls. The girls are happy, energetic and skitty, and Flutter is in awe of them at first. But it turns out the group always makes fun of Flutters real friends. So Flutter decides to choose her peacful way of life besides her friends.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: The Ant Queen has just recovered from a long sickness, so the ants decide to build her a giant Ferris Wheel on top of the hill. The work isnt going as fast as theyve planned, so the forest friends decide to help them. The work still goes slowly, so they sadly give up, but then the night stars arrive to help the group, and the Ferris Wheel is finally complete.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly - Fairy Cards Mepe
programme.desc: The three bark beetles cant decide what costume to wear to the spring carnival party. So they ask the help of Leapy. Since she also still hasnt gotten a costume yet, they come up with the idea to dress as the four seasons. Leapy becomes Spring, and the three bark beetles become Summer, Fall and Winter. The four seasonelves go on to win the costume contest at the party.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: In January, Eddy the Potato beetle and his friends visit Stanley, who presents his new toy cars. Eddy would like to try out the silver truck but accidentally breaks it. The next day, Eddy confesses his mistake and compensates Stanley with a golden-colored vehicle, while Patrik, the handyman beetle, repairs the wheel.

programme.title: Berry And Dolly
programme.desc: In February, the little friends gather for a carnival party and agree that there wont be a costume competition. Instead, the girls dress up as vegetables, while the boys dress up as fruits. However, Katie, the yellow ladybird and Snail Sam are not aware of this arrangement. So when they burst into Vendes house where the ball is taking place, everyone teams up to creatively transform their costumes. The friends enjoy the celebration, which is made complete by a large basket of colorful carnival donuts. On their way home, they admire the first snowdrops.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing wants to try Coco’s Hula Hoop. It’s harder than it looks but he finds lots of other hoopy games as he tries. Just as Bing almost gets it right he gets carried away with spinning, trips over and breaks the hoop. Coco is upset that she can’t hula anymore until Bing and Charlie remind her of all the other games they can still do with the bent hoop.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Sula are in the park playing at being giants and splashing in puddles with their big welly boots. As they play the puddles get bigger and bigger until Bing slips over in the mud and gets wet everywhere. Amma comes to the rescue with a giant warm bath and a giant carroty bagel.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Flop teaches Bing and Pando how to blow bubbles. Bing finally blows a big bubble but gets upset when Pando pops it.

programme.title: Bing Bunny
programme.desc: Bing and Sula head off for a picnic at the paddling pool with Flop. But when they get there, they are shocked to find there is no water inside. Bing’s disappointment soon gives way to the realisation that it’s a very special pool day. With no water there are all sorts of games they can play that are usually against the pool rules.

programme.title: Tilda Appleseed
programme.desc: Billy loses his baby tooth and places it under his pillow. He and Benny want to see the Tooth Fairy, so they stay awake. Eventually, they go out at night searching for her.

programme.title: Tilda Appleseed
programme.desc: Tilda Appleseed is overwhelmed by the many tasks in her guesthouse. But when she observes calm Snaily, she realizes that she can accomplish everything in a relaxed manner and one step at a time.

programme.title: Tilda Appleseed
programme.desc: Tilda finds a bottle containing a treasure map in the stream. She excitedly shows Rupert her discovery and the two go on a treasure hunt. They turn Wild Rose Lane on its head, but theres no treasure to be found. After hours of searching in vain, the pair recover with a tasty picnic in Tildas garde, where Tilda finally decodes the complicated map.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: One gorgeous Summer morning Big Nutbrown Hare wakes to find Little Nutbrown Hare enthralled by a story of Little White Owl’s. Encouraged, Little Nutbrown Hare sets off to make up a story of his own, but finds it harder than he thought to come up with one. With the help of his father, he finally uses some fruit he’s collected on the way to help him tell a very colourful tale.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: Little Nutbrown Hare has a new game. He will be Big Nutbrown Hare for a day, doing jobs like finding food, answering tricky questions and resting in the grass. Likewise, Big Nutbrown Hare must take on his son’s jobs of playing with his friends, making up new games and asking questions. It’s all great fun until they realize that they are much, much better at being themselves.

programme.title: Guess How Much I Love You
programme.desc: A Summer storm sweeps across the valley and a nervous Little Nutbrown Hare and his friends scamper into a cave with Big Nutbrown Hare. They are all safe and dry in the cave, but the thunder outside is still scary. Big Nutbrown Hare explains that noises can’t hurt you… but will he help them overcome their fears enough to enjoy the storm and the wonders of nature that it brings?

programme.title: Simon
programme.desc: Simons family are going on holiday and need to hurry to reach the boat that will take them to Grandma and Grandpas - however, once they are on the boat, Gaspard gets seasick...

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: In the South American rainforest, Peyo and Pico set up a hummingbird feeder and to their glee, a hummingbird flies around it. In the garden, Leo and Katie set up a bench chair but Hero suddenly claims a lot of space on it, not leaving much for them to Katie’s annoyance. They get a call from Peyo who informs them about the hummingbird, prompting Leo and Katie to learn more about these birds on the computer. However, a praying mantis attacks the hummingbird on the feeder and won’t let go of it. They arrive at Peyo and the hummingbird is still trying to escape the mantis. With Pico’s intervention, the hummingbird finally gets free and flies around and barely escapes a few attempts of predators in the area before resting on Leo’s hat. The rangers decide they must relocate the hummingbird and its feeder since the area is too dangerous; however, the mantis is still on the feeder. With the help of Ranger Rocky and using light to lure the mantis away from the feeder, they are able to successfully relocate the feeder. At the new location, the hummingbird happily feeds on its feeder high up in the trees, away from danger. Back at the Garden, Katie successfully gets Hero off the bench but… he leaves some dog poop for her on it.

programme.title: Leo the Wildlife Ranger
programme.desc: In the African savannah, Jane and Zumi discover a baby giraffe stuck in quicksand during their run. In the garden, Leo, Katie, and Hero engage in a game of "the grass is lava”, trying to approach a safe area using planks. Jane calls them and lets them know about the giraffe in need. Leo and Katie learn about South African giraffes on the computer. They rush to the savannah in PlatypusOne to rescue the baby giraffe. They tried to approach the giraffe using the jetpack but it scared it instead. Hence, failing their first attempt. Katie gets inspired by their ‘the grass is lava’ game earlier and suggests they use flat pieces of bark to get to it and successfully pull the giraffe to safety with a harness. Now safe, the giraffe’s neck is now going in all different directions which worry the rangers but Ranger Rocky appears, revealing the baby giraffe was just sleepy. He calls Ranger Joey who provides additional information about giraffes, and the rangers set out to reunite the baby with its mother. They locate the mother and see her neck stuck between branches which they manage to free her from. They successfully reunite the baby giraffe with its mother. In the Garden, playing a game of ‘grass is lava’, Katie takes a leap to get onto the ‘safe area’ but at the last minute, Hero crashes into her.

programme.title: Chuggington Badge Quest
programme.desc: Brewster and Koko have to find coloured cars by solving riddles that will let them know where they’re hidden. Competitive Koko is afraid Brewster will finish before she does – so when she stumbles across one of his cars, she hides it. Koko finishes before Brewster, but when Vee tells her the task can’t be completed until they both put their cars together – Koko realises she’s done the wrong thing. She confesses, and together they line the cars up to make a rainbow!

programme.title: Chuggington Badge Quest
programme.desc: To earn their badges, Koko and Brewster must ride the rails and report any problems. Emery reported 10 problems when he earned his badge, and they decide to beat that record. They split up. But Brewster’s patrol is interrupted when he tries to catch a naughty, escaped monkey who is wreaking havoc - and he doesn’t report anything. They’re disappointed they haven’t beaten the record, but when Brewster explains why he didn’t report and tells Vee about the problems the monkey caused, he learns that those problems count as a report! Koko and Brewster win their badges – and beat Emery’s record!

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: Inspired by Nina and her father, who are preparing a delicious dessert with yummy blackberries from the woods, Tchoupi wants to make his own recipe from a forest ingredient. Easier said than done: chestnuts or mushrooms aren’t always easy to find… especially when there’s a greedy squirrel roaming nearby!

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: T’choupi is pretending to Nina that he’s able to read… but loses track of the story he’s trying to tell. An idea suddenly springs to mind: why doesn’t he just make up the rest of the story, in real life?!... The only thing they need to make it complete is a little chick to play the hero of their adventure. But when catching it turns out to be a lot more difficult than they’d bargained for, they realize they may just be living the true adventure, in real time…!

programme.title: Charley Loves Nature
programme.desc: Inspired by Nina’s drawing of a rainbow, Tchoupi lists out all the colors within it. When he gets it wrong, Nina suggests they turn it into a game and look for the various hues in Nature. Loving the idea, Mom suggests they go find the colors on the flowers and vegetables in the hamlet. Nina and Tchoupi come back in next to no time, mission accomplished! Recognizing their talent, Dad ups the stakes, setting them the challenge of spotting the rainbow colors… among the animals! Mmm, easier said than done…

programme.title: Charley Goes To School
programme.desc: The children are taking a pony riding test today. They are all quite happy except for Louis, who is completely panicked! The teacher tries to comfort him but there is nothing doing. Charley is the one to find the solution by lending him… Mimmo, who is always a big help to him when he is frightened!!

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: The triplets are hard to put to sleep. Just as hard as Sams dad was! says Grandma. The only thing that used to put him to sleep was an old mobile, but its completely out of order...

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Julia dreams of joining the residences brass band, except that to do so, she must come with a musical instrument. Sam builds one for her, but Julia is too impatient to listen at her friends advice.

programme.title: Sam And Julia
programme.desc: Julia and Sam must babysit Ben. A game of hide and seek is launched in the residence. But Sams little brother is so well hidden that he cant be found. Where could he be hiding?

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Its Christmas time on the Island of Sodor and Gator is coming back after working in a land far away for a long time. He is looking forward to seeing his old friend Percy. When Percy hears that Gator is back, he is very excited and immediately heads off to see him. But the two engines keep missing each other and soon they both begin to have doubts about whether the other one wants to see them after all.

programme.title: Thomas And Friends
programme.desc: Gator is waiting to be loaded onto a ship, but the ship is delayed. So Gator is waiting around doing nothing. So when Oliver breaks down one night, Gator is very happy to help. He sets off to collect Oliver’s trucks and promises to bring them back before morning. But Gator’s lamp keeps going out and he decides not to stop or he will be late. Toad, the brake van, doesn’t think it is safe and they argue, but in the end it is Toad’s bright idea that helps Gator deliver the trucks in time.

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: Caillou teams up with Jeffery and Jason at a soft play area to play some twin-based pranks on his family.

programme.title: Caillou’s New Adventures
programme.desc: Caillous sent to his room as a punishment, but tries to escape to see his friends, imagining himself as a prisoner breaking out of jail.

programme.title: Hurray for Huckle!
programme.desc: When Mr Frumble’s morning newspaper disappears off his front step, Huckle sets out to investigate what happened to it. After a number of other innocuous items ‘disappear’ from across town, Huckle ultimately discovers that the culprits are none other than Pig Will and Pig Won’t. They are enthusiastically taking part in Busytown’s Annual Recycling Drive by picking up anything they see that can be recycled./Huckle, Lowly and Sally happen upon a huge tooth and can’t imagine anyone in all of Busytown big enough to own it.

programme.title: Monkey See Monkey Do
programme.desc: Monkeys enormous pile of coconuts falls into parrot’s hammock and rips it. Monkey looks for a needle to fix it. Mole suggests going to Hedgehog, whose back is covered with prickly needle like spines. They fly off to the forest and meet the shy hedgehog who gives them a needle and plays a game of Monkey See Monkey Do with them.

programme.title: Monkey See Monkey Do
programme.desc: Monkey has designed a paper airplane, he boasts how this will be the fastest paper airplane ever. But when he throws it, the plane immediately falls to the ground. When they meet Eagle they are impressed by his keen eye site and fast flying as he spotted Monkeys paper plane on the ground and glides down to get it.

programme.title: Fireman Sam
